relations.target: brother=09895920-n (a male with the same parents as someone else; \""my brother still lives with our parents\"");09896358-n (a male person who is a fellow member (of a fraternity or religion or other group); \""none of his brothers would betray him\"");09896590-n (used as a term of address for those male persons engaged in the same movement; \""Greetings, comrade!\"");09897417-n (a close friend who accompanies his buddies in their activities

senses.definition: A sibling's younger brother (''used especially by children, or by parents in speaking to their children'')
